Source code for mosekTools.solver.model.model

from mosek.fusion import *
import numpy as np



[docs]def weights(model, name, n, lb=-np.infty, ub=np.infty):
    """
        Introduce n positive weights for the portfolio
        """
    return model.variable(name, n, Domain.inRange(lb, ub))




[docs]def build_model(name):
    """
        build a mosek.fusion model
        """
    return Model(name)




[docs]def minimise(model, expr):
    """
        minimise the expr
        """
    model.objective(ObjectiveSense.Minimize, expr)
    model.solve()




[docs]def maximise(model, expr):
    """
        maximise the expr
        """
    model.objective(ObjectiveSense.Maximize, expr)
    model.solve()
